abstract: Environmental organizations that belong to the U.S. Climate Action Partnership are downplaying the departure this week of BP, Caterpillar and ConocoPhillips.
snippet: Environmental organizations that belong to the U.S. Climate Action Partnership are downplaying the departure this week of BP, Caterpillar and ConocoPhillips.
lead_paragraph: Environmental organizations that belong to the U.S. Climate Action Partnership are downplaying the departure this week of BP, Caterpillar and ConocoPhillips, saying the high-profile alliance will continue to make its presence felt as lawmakers fine-tune the climate change bills in the House and the Senate.
